Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010296 ZRM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Map Changes, CD#1, Manhattan (010296ZRM)

Items.Title: Application no. 20015418 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Favia, Inc., to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 1140 Second Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 5.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010556 ZMM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 010405 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to allow the conversion of an existing building to museum use.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Conversion Building to Museum, CD#3, Manhattan (010405ZSM)

Items.Title: Zoning resolution amendment application no. 010404 ZRY, pursuant to §197-d and §200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, all zoning districts, relating: to a text amendment modifying Section 74-921 creating a special permit to allow museums and non-commercial art galleries in UG 3A to locate in M1- 5 Districts.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Museums & Non-commercial Art Galleries in UG 3A, Citywide (010404ZRY)
